verbs.description: [V: suspected] [ARG1: gunman] in synagogue massacre expected in federal court today robert bowers is expected to appear in federal court monday on charges related to saturday shooting at the tree of life synagogue in squirrel hill that left 11 dead and six others injured pittsburgh robert bowers tree of life synagogue
